item.title: 新日铁计划投资 60 亿美元建设日本钢厂
item.description: 卷入收购美国钢铁公司长期争夺战的日本新日铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：Nippon Steel Corp., the Japanese company embroiled in lengthy battle to buy US Steel Corp., said it plans to spend 869 billion yen ($6 billion) at home to expand output from cleaner furnaces.】

item.title: 如果法庭之争失败，特朗普的关税选择会更慢、更复杂
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府坚称，无论以何种方式，他的关税政策都不会改变。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration insists his tariffs are here to stay, one way or another.】

item.title: 韩国养老金加大海外投资，迎战 "卖美 "风潮
item.description: 韩国最大的养老基金计划购买更多的外国股票，而此时特朗普政府的关税议程所推动的 "抛售美国 "趋势正开始占据上风。【原文：South Korea’s largest pension fund plans to buy more foreign stocks, just as a “sell America” trend fueled by the Trump administration’s tariff agenda begins to take hold.】

item.title: 韩国股市再创新高，获利者在芯片之外实现多元化
item.description: 创下 52 周新高的韩国股票比近年来任何时候都要多，这反映了企业改革的希望和市场涨幅的多样化，而不仅仅是半导体重量级股票。【原文：More South Korean stocks are hitting their 52-week high than at any other point in recent years, reflecting hopes for corporate reform and diversification in the market’s gainers beyond semiconductor heavyweights.】

item.title: 管理者称，日本放弃回购可能会带来长期利益
item.description: 据报道，日本政府某部门建议企业将闲置现金用于投资，而不是回购股票。【原文：A reported recommendation from a Japanese government ministry that companies use spare cash for investment instead of buying back stock would benefit long-term investors, according to asset managers.】

item.title: Jump India 据称将聘请来自 IMC 的阿赫塔尔担任最高技术职务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球做市商 Jump Trading 在印度的分支机构 Jump India 已聘请 Javed Akhtar 领导其技术部门。【原文：Jump India, the local arm of global market maker Jump Trading, has hired Javed Akhtar to lead its technology division, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易不确定性再起，中国股市在香港下跌
item.description: 在美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示全球最大的两个经济体之间的贸易谈判 "有点停滞不前 "之后，中国股市周五在香港下跌。【原文：Chinese stocks fell in Hong Kong on Friday, after US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said trade talks between the world’s two largest economies are “a bit stalled.”】

item.title: 马斯克与电报公司的人工智能协议为更多戏剧性事件埋下伏笔
item.description:
通过与人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 的深度整合，帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）的自由应用程序上的阴谋论和极端主义可能会得到进一步发展。【原文：

Conspiracy theories and extremism on Pavel Durov’s freewheeling app could be supercharged by a deep integration with AI chatbot Grok.  

】

item.title: 中国对冲基金买入四月跌势 将十年涨幅扩大至 1,485
item.description: 一家中国对冲基金在 4 月份美国新关税导致中国股市暴跌时买入，今年以来该基金的回报率已跃升 20%，自十年前成立以来的总回报率达到 1485%。【原文：A Chinese hedge fund that bought the dip in April when the nation’s stocks plunged on fresh US tariffs has jumped 20% this year, extending its total return since inception a decade ago to 1,485%.】

item.title: 经济学家警告欧洲央行避免延迟最后两次降息
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，欧洲央行将再降息两次，但受访者警告说，两次降息之间不应间隔太久，否则投资者会认为欧洲央行的宽松政策已经结束。【原文：The European Central Bank will lower interest rates twice more, according to a Bloomberg survey, but respondents warned it shouldn’t wait too long between those moves or investors will conclude that its easing campaign is already over.】

item.title: 欧拉电动车大幅下跌，销售额下降导致亏损增加一倍多
item.description: 由于销售额下降，Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 公布的季度亏损比一年前增加了一倍多，创下一个多月以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. declined the most in more than a month, after reporting quarterly losses that more than doubled from a year ago as sales dropped.】

item.title: 丝绸协会称新西兰央行需要更多时间决定现金利率路径
item.description: 新西兰储备银行行长助理凯伦-希尔克（Karen Silk）表示，新西兰储备银行需要更多时间来评估全球贸易动荡对本地经济的影响，然后才能决定官方现金利率的适当路径。【原文：The Reserve Bank of New Zealand needs more time to assess the impact of global trade turmoil on the local economy before deciding on the appropriate path for the Official Cash Rate, Assistant Governor Karen Silk said.】

item.title: 镍业巨头青山削减印尼不锈钢产量
item.description: 由于需求低迷和贸易不确定性对市场造成压力，全球最大的不锈钢制造商暂停了在印度尼西亚的部分生产线，以支撑价格。【原文：The world’s biggest maker of stainless steel has suspended some production lines in Indonesia, in a bid to support prices as sluggish demand and trade uncertainty weigh on the market.】

item.title: 波动率指数急剧下降，令经验丰富的交易员措手不及
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 报告称马来西亚将开始使用榴莲追踪系统遏制欺诈行为
item.description: 据Bernama报道，马来西亚槟榔屿州已敦促其榴莲种植者注册一个追踪系统，以从6月1日起遏制这种带刺、辛辣水果的假冒产品的传播。【原文：Malaysia’s state of Penang has urged its durian growers to register for a tracking system to curb the spread of counterfeit versions of the prickly, pungent fruit from June 1, according to Bernama.】

item.title: 野村认为尽管美国局势动荡，但仍有巨大发展机遇
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. is setting its sights on the US for growth despite the current turmoil surrounding the world’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 中国同意恢复从日本进口部分海产品
item.description: 日本农业大臣小泉晋二郎周五表示，中国同意允许从日本进口海产品，但还需等待一些最后的程序性举措，这比北京在东京于 2023 年排放核电站废水后全面禁止进口海产品又向前迈进了一步。【原文：China agreed to allow seafood imports from Japan pending some final procedural moves, Japan’s Agriculture Minister Shinjiro Koizumi said on Friday, in a step forward from Beijing’s blanket ban on the shipments following Tokyo’s release in 2023 of wastewater from a wrecked nuclear power plant.】

item.title: 澳大利亚零售销售意外下滑，预计澳大利亚央行将进一步减息
item.description: 澳大利亚 4 月份零售额在连续三个月增长后意外下降，主要原因是服装购买量下降，促使交易商提前预期今年将第三次降息。【原文：Australian retail sales unexpectedly fell in April after three months of gains, led by a decline in clothing purchases and prompting traders to bring forward expectations for a third interest rate cut this year.】

item.title: 关税休战让中美贸易畅通无阻
item.description: 全球最大的两个经济体之间的关税之争停火，鼓励了太平洋地区的贸易，在集装箱预订开始放缓的情况下，三周以来的货运价格仍在上涨。【原文：The ceasefire in the tariff fight between the world’s two largest economies is encouraging trade across the Pacific, holding up freight prices three weeks on, even as container bookings have begun to slow.】

item.title: 沙特公用事业公司希望在马来西亚开展价值 100 亿美元的可再生能源项目
item.description: 沙特公用事业公司 Acwa 电力公司与马来西亚公司签署了不具约束力的协议，包括探讨到 2040 年开发约 13 千兆瓦的发电能力，投资总额达 100 亿美元。【原文：Saudi utility Acwa Power Co. signed non-binding agreements with Malaysian firms, including to explore development of about 13 gigawatts of power generation capacity, totaling $10 billion in investments by 2040.】

item.title: 伊朗贸易引关注，马来西亚近海油轮停航
item.description: 由于美国制裁的威胁，伊朗至中国石油贸易的重要枢纽油轮正从数字跟踪系统中消失，迫使其改变策略，以保持原油流动。【原文：Tankers involved in a vital hub of the Iran-to-China oil trade are disappearing from digital tracking systems, as the threat of US sanctions forces tactical changes to keep crude flowing.】

item.title: Glencore 通过澳大利亚实体整合全球煤炭投资组合
item.description: 矿业和贸易公司 Glencore Plc 向澳大利亚监管机构提交的年度报告显示，该公司将其全球煤炭和铁合金资产组合整合到一家在澳大利亚注册的公司旗下。【原文：Mining and trading house Glencore Plc consolidated its global portfolio of coal and ferroalloy assets under one company registered in Australia, according to its annual report lodged with the country’s regulator.】

item.title: 特朗普在美国钢铁业的 "黄金股份 "为何会黯然失色？
item.description: 作为批准日本新日铁公司以 140 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的条件之一，美国政府可能获得美国钢铁公司的所谓黄金股份或类似权力。【原文：The US government could receive a so-called golden share — or powers akin to it — in United States Steel Corp. as a condition for approving a $14 billion takeover by Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp.】

item.title: 新的贸易不确定性刺激避险需求，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 本周早些时候，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全球关税计划和美国经济实力的不确定性再次令市场惶恐不安，黄金收复了一些重大损失。【原文：Gold recovered some heavy losses sustained earlier this week, as markets were once again rattled by uncertainties around US President Donald Trump’s global tariffs agenda and the strength of the US economy.】

item.title: 罗根发出信号：美联储调整利率可能尚需时日
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，官员们可能还需要一段时间才能知道经济将如何应对关税和其他政策变化，从而知道应该如何调整利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan signaled it may take a while before officials know how the economy will respond to tariffs and other policy changes and thus how they should adjust interest rates.】

item.title: 国债下跌，新兴市场高收益债券或将跑赢同行
item.description: 根据彭博社的分析，由于美元下滑削弱了国债收益率的上升，风险较高的新兴市场债券可能会继续跑赢收益率较低的同类债券，从而保护投资者的回报。【原文：Riskier emerging-market bonds may continue to beat their lower-yielding peers as the dollar’s slide softens a rise in Treasury yields, protecting investor returns, according to analysis by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 中国 Z 世代热衷游戏，网易股价逼近历史新高
item.description: 网易公司股价正接近四年多来的首个历史新高，年轻消费主义浪潮为中国游戏股增添了一系列利好因素。【原文：NetEase Inc. shares are closing in on their first new all-time high in over four years, as a wave of youthful consumerism adds to a host of positives for China’s game stocks.】

item.title: 关税动荡导致全球资金重新涌入日本股市
item.description: 关税动荡正吸引全球投资者重返日本股市，因为更好的股东回报前景吸引了逃离美国经济不确定性的资金。【原文：Tariff turmoil is drawing global investors back to Japan’s stock market, as prospects of better shareholder returns entice funds fleeing economic uncertainty in the US.】

item.title: 贝森特称特朗普与习近平通话可能有助于会谈 "略有停滞
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，与中国的贸易谈判 "有点停滞不前"，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平之间可能需要通一次电话，世界上最大的两个经济体才能达成协议。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said trade talks with China are “a bit stalled,” and that a call between President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping may be needed for the world’s two largest economies to reach a deal.】

item.title: 东京房价两年来最大涨幅给石破带来压力
item.description: 东京物价创下两年来最大涨幅，这是首相石破茂在夏季大选前的一个令人担忧的迹象，也将使央行在未来几个月内再次加息。【原文：Prices in Tokyo jumped the most in two years, in a worrisome sign for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba ahead of a summer election, and one that will keep the central bank on track for another rate hike in coming months.】
